A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Totally destroyed Luke Skywalker as a character. This is not a Star Wars movie. Star Wars is about the Skywalker family. If indeed the revelations in this movie especially about Rey remains Canon and is not changed by the end of the movie\, then this new sequel trilogy fails and is not a successor to the prequels and the originals. The story arch of the skywalker family being redeemed through Darth Vader/Anakin and Luke is completely destroyed in this movie.
